Index: if-archive

You feel somewhat disoriented as you pass through...

This is the Interactive Fiction Archive at ifarchive.org.

You may be interested in...

  • The README file for the Archive.
  • The list of directories in the Archive.
  • New arrivals in the past week, past month, past three months, or past year.
  • An RSS feed of recent arrivals.
  • A list of every file in the archive (tens of thousands!)
  • Master-Index.xml, which describes every file in the Archive (very large XML file!)

Or, go delving into the hierarchical tree shown here.

5 Subdirectories

art ◆

Art stuff.

comp ◆

Competitions. This is a long line of text so we can see how the column width is going to work out in real life.

compfiles ◆ [link to if-archive/comp/files]
games ◆

Games stuff.
